name: Project 3 (rmm58)
description:
Time to draw! 

To have the UFO hover over your canvas, press animate UFO! If you would like to turn the UFO highbeams off press "O" and "L" to turn them back on again. 

m a variety of shapes from the dropdown menu or draw using an alien that you can either make dance by pressing "2" or wave by pressing "1". 

When you pick a color, you can change the shade of the color by using the slider.  

To rotate the cube, cylinder, and capsule shapes, use the arrow keys on your keyboard.

  If you want randomly sized objects based on the time, click the box! 

You will get smaller objects on every 1-20 seconds of the minute, medium objects on 20-40 seconds on the minute and larger objects on 40-60 seconds on the minute. 

To destroy all drawn objects with a meteor, click destroy all!
